entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is mentioned as someone who will try to collect Harry. He is described as trying to collect Harry and calling him the 'jewel of his collection'.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as being referred to by Professor Slughorn as the 'Boy Who Lived' or the 'Chosen One'. He is also described as feeling a chill and remembering words that have a horrible meaning for him.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as stopping walking and telling Harry to grasp his arm. He is also described as helping Harry with the Apparition.

entities.name: the burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is mentioned as a building that Harry likes and is looking at when he arrives by Apparition.

relationships.description: Professor Slughorn tries to collect Harry, calling him the 'jewel of his collection'.
Dumbledore helps Harry with the Apparition.
